description: Manage provider offerings for Azure Quantum.

commands.name: az quantum offerings accept-terms
commands.summary: Accept the terms of a provider and SKU combination to enable it for workspace creation.
examples: az quantum offerings accept-terms -p MyProviderId -k MySKU -l MyLocation

commands.name: az quantum offerings list
commands.summary: Get the list of all provider offerings available on the given location.
examples: az quantum offerings list -l MyLocation -o table
az quantum offerings list -l MyLocation --autoadd-only -o table

commands.name: az quantum offerings show-terms
commands.summary: Show the terms of a provider and SKU combination including license URL and acceptance status.
examples: az quantum offerings show-terms -p MyProviderId -k MySKU -l MyLocation
